game.title: The Missing Heirloom
game.objective: Retrieve the stolen family heirloom from the bandit's den.
game.description: Lady Whimsy's favorite necklace has been stolen, and she needs your help to get it back. The thief is hiding in a bandit's den on the outskirts of town.
game.reward: 100 gold pieces and Lady Whimsy's gratitude

tasks.description: Talk to the townspeople and gather clues about the thief's identity and whereabouts.
Sneak into the bandit's den at night, avoiding detection by the guards.
Find and retrieve Lady Whimsy's necklace from the thief.
